turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to place an order from the Starbucks on Market Street in Philadelphia.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a coffee latte tall with almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you said a caffe latte right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me place that order for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And this is a tall with almond milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it! one moment while i place that order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so i have placed an order for a tall caffe latte with almond milk to be picked up from the starbucks on market street in philadelphia, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your receipt will be texted for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your caffe latte should be ready for pickup in 10 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?
